channel.title: This Message needs to be removed
channel.description:
Well it comes to my opinion that 4chan can be good at time and at other times they can destroy people's lives. Like the current attack on Justin Beiber's baby video would be a great example of the good they can do.
So if you would like to start a group like 4chan, how would you go about doing it? What would you make the site like? and how would you spam, destroy, and help, on the internet? In my mind 4chan is the dictator of a large portion of the internet, and can go to show how much people can sway the vote so to say.
I post this because of my studies about the site and it's mysterious creator, and the immense amount of times that the site has come to my attention.

item.title: This Message needs to be removed
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:6, topic:358257”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=454763.msg3329984#msg3329984 date=1283392633]

Well it comes to my opinion that 4chan can be good at time and at other times they can destroy people’s lives. Like the current attack on Justin Beiber’s baby video would be a great example of the good they can do.

So if you would like to start a group like 4chan, how would you go about doing it? What would you make the site like? and how would you spam, destroy, and help, on the internet? In my mind 4chan is the dictator of a large portion of the internet, and can go to show how much people can sway the vote so to say.

I post this because of my studies about the site and it’s mysterious creator, and the immense amount of times that the site has come to my attention.

You seriously know nothing about 4chan. 4chan is not just a group of people on that website alone, There are MANY ‘chan’ sites around, that number a massive amount of people. Also, How do you expect to make a difference? You need a certain target that would get every bodies attention to join (EX: Anon and Scientology). If you plan on creating a “4chan” like website, you are going to need to find their base, and modify it accordingly.

I have already found all of the information if I wanted to create a 4chan-like website directly on 4chan. Time it took me: 10 seconds tops.
[/quote]
okay, i’m not saying i know MUCH about 4chan dude, i’m just sayin’ we could start a new site that can do all of 4chan’s shit without their influence.

Plus i have resources beyond moparscape or even rsps or even any other forums to be able to set up a site with enough tools to run something massive. I just don’t know what to do with my time anymore[/quote]

This one thread will tell you exactly how to setup a “4chan”-clone.
http://dis.4chan.org/read/prog/1185963886

Notice the name on the base they used (on the site) Shiichan Anonymous BBS, I wish you luck.

Read full topic
item.source: This Message needs to be removed

Well it comes to my opinion that 4chan can be good at time and at other times they can destroy people’s lives. Like the current attack on Justin Beiber’s baby video would be a great example of the good they can do.

I post this because of my studies about the site and it’s mysterious creator, and the immense amount of times that the site has come to my attention.
[/quote]
You seriously know nothing about 4chan. 4chan is not just a group of people on that website alone, There are MANY ‘chan’ sites around, that number a massive amount of people. Also, How do you expect to make a difference? You need a certain target that would get every bodies attention to join (EX: Anon and Scientology). If you plan on creating a “4chan” like website, you are going to need to find their base, and modify it accordingly.

I have already found all of the information if I wanted to create a 4chan-like website directly on 4chan. Time it took me: 10 seconds tops.[/quote]
okay, i’m not saying i know MUCH about 4chan dude, i’m just sayin’ we could start a new site that can do all of 4chan’s shit without their influence.

Plus i have resources beyond moparscape or even rsps or even any other forums to be able to set up a site with enough tools to run something massive. I just don’t know what to do with my time anymore

item.description:

[quote=“Javafire, post:1, topic:358257”]Well it comes to my opinion that 4chan can be good at time and at other times they can destroy people’s lives. Like the current attack on Justin Beiber’s baby video would be a great example of the good they can do.

So if you would like to start a group like 4chan, how would you go about doing it? What would you make the site like? and how would you spam, destroy, and help, on the internet? In my mind 4chan is the dictator of a large portion of the internet, and can go to show how much people can sway the vote so to say.

I post this because of my studies about the site and it’s mysterious creator, and the immense amount of times that the site has come to my attention.[/quote]
You seriously know nothing about 4chan. 4chan is not just a group of people on that website alone, There are MANY ‘chan’ sites around, that number a massive amount of people. Also, How do you expect to make a difference? You need a certain target that would get every bodies attention to join (EX: Anon and Scientology). If you plan on creating a “4chan” like website, you are going to need to find their base, and modify it accordingly.

I have already found all of the information if I wanted to create a 4chan-like website directly on 4chan. Time it took me: 10 seconds tops.
